moves.1. d4: D4 I;m having a lot of joy from this at the moment
moves.1... d5 2. Bf4 c5: This game is going to be interesting
moves.3... Nc6 4. c3 Bf5 5. Nd2 c4: I think that this is ok but Qb6 would have been better
moves.6. Ngf3 f6: Black is going to play e5. I am really happy with this positionas the black king seems to be a little exposed and black is a little behind on development
moves.7. Be2 e5: White wins a pawn, I am really not sure why black did this at this moment
moves.11. Bg3 a6 12. O-O: Blacks king is really exposed and he has two minot pieces which aren't in the game
moves.12... Nf6 13. Nf3: The black queen isn't in the best of places
moves.13... Qg4 14. Ne5: The knight is in a very strong position
moves.14... Qe4 15. Rc1: I use the rook to cut off an escape square for the queen
moves.17. Qa5 Bd6: This seems very logical it frees the bishop and will aloow black to castle

opening: Queen's pawn, Mason variation, Steinitz counter-gambit (D00)
